column3: 2015. local florists send gifts services - 10:00 am tuesday
column5: 2015 in robertson funeral directors saints roost chapel with rev. anthony knowles
column6: officiating. interment- citizens cemetery in clarendon. arrangements - robertson funeral directors of clarendon. rosey was born april 6
column7: 1938 in goodnight to kenneth and jewel walker morrow. she was a teacher prior to her retirement. she loved quilting and reading. she had been a resident of clarendon most of her life and was a member of the first baptist church in clarendon. preceded in death by her parents; a brother
